game.name: ESPER
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: As one of a small number of citizens who have been endowed with the power to move objects with their minds, you have been enrolled by the government to undertake a series of tests to show that you are in control of your powers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: As one of a small number of citizens who have been endowed with the power to move objects with their minds, you have been enrolled by the government to undertake a series of tests to show that you are in control of your powers.
